```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(xkcd)
```

```{r xkcdrect, cache = TRUE}
volunteers <- data.frame(year=c(2007:2011),
                         number=c(56470, 56998,59686, 61783, 64251))
p <- ggplot() + xkcdrect(aes(xmin = year,
                             xmax= year +0.3,
                             ymin=number,
                             ymax = number + 3600),
                         volunteers,
                         fill="red", colour="black")
p



```
